summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BeautyBar609 Admin Panel with excellent results. Backend APIs 92.6% successful, frontend UI/UX working perfectly.

minor_bugs.impact: Cannot edit existing promotions via API

minor_bugs.issue: Update operation failing for gallery images
minor_bugs.impact: Cannot edit gallery image captions/order via API

passed_tests: Admin login page loads with proper styling and data-testid attributes
Login/Register tab switching works flawlessly
Admin user registration with unique credentials
Automatic redirect to dashboard after successful registration
JWT authentication and token management via AuthContext
Dashboard overview tab displays analytics (16 views, 2 unique visitors)
All navigation tabs functional: Overview, Services, Prices, Testimonials, Promotions, Gallery
Services management: Add service form opens and submits correctly
Complete CRUD operations for Services (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
Complete CRUD operations for Prices (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
Complete CRUD operations for Testimonials (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
Complete CRUD operations for Promotions (GET, POST, DELETE)
Complete CRUD operations for Gallery (GET, POST, DELETE)
Analytics tracking (POST /api/analytics/track)
Analytics summary with real data (GET /api/analytics/summary)
Seed data functionality working
Logout functionality redirects to login page
Professional dark theme with gold accent colors
Responsive design and mobile-friendly navigation
Proper error handling and user feedback
Environment variable usage for backend URL
All API endpoints use proper /api prefix for Kubernetes routing
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix two minor API issues: 1) Promotions UPDATE endpoint (PUT /api/promotions/{id}) 2) Gallery UPDATE endpoint (PUT /api/gallery/{id}). Both endpoints return success for CREATE and DELETE but fail on UPDATE operations.
